landing.cet_overview: Founded in 1939, College of Engineering, Trivandrum (CET) is Kerala's first engineering college, established during the reign of Sri Chithira Thirunal Balarama Varma. Initially started with 21 students in Civil, Mechanical, and Electrical Engineering, CET moved to its expansive 125-acre campus in 1960 and is now managed by the Kerala Government.
landing.cse_overview: Established in 1984, the Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) department is known for its academic excellence and strong placement records. With 21 faculty members and a top student intake, CSE has a legacy of producing skilled engineers with alumni holding prominent positions globally in industry, academia, and research.
